title: sutantara varam
sahitya:
sutantara varam taruvAi nAngaL paDum tuyargaLai nIkka varuvAi jagad rakSakA


anupallavi

  kadam tarum kAmAdik-kaLLap-pisAcugaL kaTTaDimaiyAkki uNNAmalE


caraNam    Ayuda mAyattAl aNuguNDu vEgattAl asurap-pisAcugaL arattinai azhikkAmal
nI engaL arasanAi nAngaL aDiyarAi nimirndu naDandiDa nenjam kuLirndiDavE
